lines.gurmukhi: jYsy Dr DnuK clweIAq bwn qwn; clÎo jwie iqq hI kau ijq hI clweIAY [

Unknown.translation: Just as an arrow is placed in a bow, the bowstring is pulled and arrow released in the direction in which it is intended to go.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: ijvyˆ DnuK qy bwx Dr ky qy iK`c ky clweIdw hY qwˆ auh auDr nUM hI cilAw jwˆdw hY ijDr nUM clweIdw hY[

lines.gurmukhi: jYsy AsÍ cwbuk lgwie qn qyj kir; dorÎo jwie Awqur huie ihq hI daurweIAY [

Unknown.translation: Just as a horse is whipped to make it run faster and agitated, it keeps running in the direction it is made to run

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: ijvyˆ ijvyˆ GoVy dy qn qy cwbk lgwieAwˆ GoVw qyzI nwl ivAwkul ho ky BI auDry hI dOiVAw jwˆdw hY ijDr nUM duVweIdw hY[

lines.gurmukhi: jYsI dwsI nwiekw kY AgRBwg TwNFI rhY; DwvY iqq hI qwih ijq hI pTweIAY [

Unknown.translation: Just as an obedient maid-servant keeps standing in attention in front of her mistress, and she hastes away to the direction she is sent,

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: ijvyˆ suAwmxI A`gy dwsI iqAwr br iqAwr KVI rihMdI hY qy auDr nUM hI dOVdI hY ijDr nUM ByjI jwˆdI hY[

lines.gurmukhi: qYsy pRwxI ikrq sMjog lg BRmY BUm; jq jq Kwn pwn qhI jwie KweIAY [610[

Unknown.translation: Similarly, an individual keeps wandering on this Earth according to the deeds that he had performed (in previous birth). He goes where he is destined to sustain himself.  (610)

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: iqvyˆ pRwxI ikrq sMjogwˆ Anuswr DrqI qy Brmdw iPrdw hY, ij`Qy ij`Qy ies dw Kwxw pIxw huMdw hY, au`Qy au`Qy hI jw ky Kwˆdw hY ]610]
